greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: When regarded as a triangle, the rows of A162797 converge to this sequence.
link: David Applegate, Omar E. Pol and N. J. A. Sloane, The Toothpick Sequence and Other Sequences from Cellular Automata, Congressus Numerantium, Vol. 206 (2010), 157-191. [There is a typo in Theorem 6: (13) should read u(n) = 4.3^(wt(n-1)-1) for n >= 2.]
N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
example: If written as a triangle begins:
It appears that the final terms of rows give A000337.
It appears that row sums give A010036.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 22 2010
ext: More terms a(20)-a(32) from _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 01 2011
